Flicker/Phoenix/Skyblaze::

"Condor, among others, was getting wise to me.  I had to leave, 
otherwise I would have been caught.  Anyway, that's beside the 
point.  You're here now, and until Hydras gets back to us, I'm in 
charge of this circus."  Flicker swirls the contents of his glass 
around.  "While we're here ... Skyblaze, could you perhaps explain 
how you sensed the death of a transformer I doubt you've ever met?"

"I, and my young daughter here, are not originally from Cybertron," 
Skyblaze says.  "We are members of an energy-based race called the 
Lumin - and sadly, we are a dying breed.  Most of us are too old to 
reproduce, including myself."

Flicker raises an eyebrow.  "Well, that clears up a few things."  
Phoenix slides closer to him and rests her head on his shoulder.  
Flicker automatically puts his arm around her shoulders - something 
they've done many times before.  "It looks like your amnesia's 
finally been cured."

Phoenix smiles.  "Yeah, finally."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        "Hmm...?"  He thinks for a moment.  "Yes, I suppose there 
was that one 
> that Flicker killed during his escape.  Which I might add," he 
turns back to 
> Flicker, "was poorly planned.  You probably could have walked out 
without 
> anyone noticing.  I doubt anyone has noticed my absence yet."
